page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: Most yougsters get up about 6.30 to 7.30 on a school day.Some have to deliver newspapers so they have to get up earlier.Before breakfast most people have a wash, then for breakfast they have cereal,toast and for a drink tea, coffee,milk or fruit juice.From about 7.45 to 8.15,most people leave for school.Some go by bus, some walk or bike with friends. School begins at 8.50 and finishes at 3.50.Lessons consist of maths, English, French, science and others. At 12.00 it's time for lunch.Most children stay in school for their meal and either have packed lunch or school dinners. During the day there may be two breaks lasting 15 minutes.Most children stand around in the playground talking about the latest news,but some boys play football.At 5.30 they have tea, then do their homework.At 9.30 most go to bed.
